dashboard.title: Dashboard Financeiro Angola
dashboard.subtitle: A modern financial management platform built for the Angolan market

overview.challengeText: Angolan businesses needed a modern, localized financial management solution with multi-currency support and real-time insights.
overview.solutionText: Built a full-stack web application with autonomous AI agents handling data processing, analytics, and intelligent recommendations.
overview.impactText: Production-ready platform deployed on Vercel with automatic deployments, real-time updates, and enterprise-grade performance.

problem.title: The
problem.description: The Angolan market lacked modern, web-based financial management tools that understood local currency dynamics (AOA), business practices, and regulatory requirements. Existing solutions were either:

issues.outdated: Outdated desktop software with poor user experience
issues.international: International SaaS platforms not localized for Angola
issues.expensive: Expensive enterprise solutions beyond reach of SMEs
issues.manual: Manual spreadsheet-based workflows prone to errors

problem.conclusion: Businesses needed a solution that combined modern web technology, local market understanding, and intelligent automation to streamline financial operations.

dashboard.title: Real-Time Dashboard
dashboard.description: Live financial metrics, cash flow visualization, and performance indicators updated in real-time.

currency.title: Multi-Currency Support
currency.description: Native AOA support with automatic exchange rate updates for USD, EUR, and other currencies.

transactions.title: Transaction Management
transactions.description: Track income, expenses, and transfers with categorization and tagging capabilities.

analytics.title: Analytics & Reports
analytics.description: Automated financial reports, trend analysis, and customizable data visualizations.

architecture.title: Technical Architecture
architecture.description: Built with a modern, scalable stack designed for performance and maintainability:

aiAutomation.title: AI &
aiAutomation.description: EmptyBot and autonomous sub-agents handled the entire development lifecycle:

codeGen.title: Code Generation
codeGen.description: Automated scaffolding, component creation, and API endpoint generation with type-safe patterns.

testing.title: Testing & QA
testing.description: Continuous testing of features, edge cases, and performance bottlenecks throughout development.

deployment.title: Deployment
deployment.description: Automated builds, zero-downtime deployments to Vercel, and continuous monitoring.

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: Automatic generation of technical docs, API references, and deployment guides.

achievements.title: Key Achievements
achievements.production: Production-ready application deployed on Vercel with automatic CI/CD
achievements.responsive: Mobile-responsive design working seamlessly across all devices
achievements.performance: High-performance architecture with PostgreSQL + Redis caching
achievements.typeSafe: Type-safe codebase with comprehensive TypeScript coverage
achievements.scalable: Scalable architecture ready for thousands of concurrent users

nextjs.title: Why Next.js 14?
nextjs.description: Server Components, App Router, and built-in optimizations provide exceptional performance and developer experience. Perfect for building fast, SEO-friendly financial dashboards.

typescript.title: Why TypeScript?
typescript.description: Type safety prevents bugs before they reach production. Critical for financial applications where data accuracy and reliability are paramount.

prisma.title: Why Prisma + PostgreSQL?
prisma.description: Type-safe database queries, automatic migrations, and PostgreSQL's reliability ensure data integrity and scalability for growing businesses.

redis.title: Why Redis?
redis.description: Lightning-fast caching for frequently accessed data like exchange rates and user sessions, dramatically improving response times.
